metadata.title: CVE-2020-11047 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: In FreeRDP after 1.1 and before 2.0.0, there is an out-of-bounds read inautodetect_recv_bandwidth_measure_results. A malicious server can extractup to 8 bytes of client memory with a manipulated message by providing ashort input and reading the measurement result data. This has been patchedin 2.0.0.

criterions.comment: freerdp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
